hand1= [1114.3731942484565, 1209.421385560678, 276.03538703627083, 273.6156281776025, 254.64878958404316, 244.64470379672002, 217.46195893041795, 236.84891993415366, 219.15429541836792, 250.84828448407902, 202.32436744752994]

import numpy as np
hand_list = ([hand1, hand2, hand3, hand4, hand5])

np.mean(hand_list, axis=0)
# array([ 1150.21222603,  1199.8128491 ,   304.67492867,   281.22415254,
#         236.09365029,   258.37304476,   230.14712653,   242.15889335,
